questions.quote: You know what's going on? First, he vomits on me. Then, he burns down my father's cabin. And now, he's taken Mona away from me.
Oh, don't worry. I'll be there and I'll be packing an artery.
Yeah, "Levine". And I'm Jerry Cougar Mellencamp. Anyway, I admit it was a fairly ridiculous thing to do, but I mean, I mean, obviously we have a little problem here.
He killed. He only does well when he has me for a lead-in. He's a time slot hit.
Well, let's see? I seem to recall a conversation with Mrs. Winston in 1F.
Yeah, yeah, maybe I can get him to draw a picture of her for you.
I come in here to get a pleasant meal and if we're not gonna have one I'll grab a bite to eat at your place.
That's not the point. You put me in a position where I had no choice.
You're doomed. You're gonna have to have all your sex at women's apartments. It'll be like a permanent road trip. Forget about the home bed advantage.
I know, I just can't bring myself to do it meanwhile that freezer keeps getting smaller and smaller   oh, don't wanna keep Tony waiting
